name: Add Crisp users from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new user in Crisp. The template uses this [examplle spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cpuMQI3coZGnQubt0uejAGItuaknJgYW__LEU9mofo4/edit?usp=sharing).
